abstract: What class the claims end up could mean a difference of more than $100 million to Deutsche Bank and other distressed debt investors.
snippet: What class the claims end up could mean a difference of more than $100 million to Deutsche Bank and other distressed debt investors.
lead_paragraph: Does Deutsche Bank have "buyer's remorse," or a legitimate argument that it bought a Lehman Brothers claim that provided for treatment as a "general unsecured claim" and thus it should be treated as a general unsecured claim?
